description.db:para: This table is used by the Dynamic Routing module to store information about the routing rules. More information can be found at: &OPENSIPS_MOD_DOC;drouting.html.

column.name: groupid
column.description: The ID(s) of the routing group(s) this rule is to be used for - comma separeted list of numerical Ids

column.name: prefix
column.description: Numerical prefix to match this rule

column.name: timerec
column.description: Time recurrence used for matching this rule.

column.name: priority
column.description: Priority of this rule (among rules with same prefix and timerec).

column.name: routeid
column.description: Route block (from cfg script) to be called when rule matches.

column.name: gwlist
column.description: Reference to the GWs/destinations to be used when rule matches.

column.name: sort_alg
column.description: The sorting algorithm to be employed for the rule's destinations when do_routing() is called. Possible values: 'N' (default; no sorting, preserve given order), 'W' (weight based sorting), 'Q' (quality-based sorting, provided by the qrouting module)

column.name: sort_profile
column.description: Whenever the 'Q' (quality-based routing) sorting algorithm is provided, this column must hold a profile id belonging to the "qr_profiles" table.

column.name: attrs
column.description: Generic string describing RULE attributes - this string is to be interpreted from the script
